title: Remnants of You
description: When letting go isn't an option...Fate has a funny way of giving you what you want most.The only girl you've ever loved sitting on the other side of the conference table in a legal dispute.The boy who shattered your heart, taking pieces of it with him when he left, showing up at your workplace looking at you like you're the only one who can put the broken pieces of his life back together.As the past and the present start to mix, the draw becomes too strong to resist, but is it worth risking it all for feelings that may only exist in our memories?..Remnants of You is the third and final installment of the BFF SeriesThis series of steamy contemporary romance books introduces us to the world of Zoe, Trista and Phoebe, three lifelong best friends and their journey to find love.While each book can be read as a standalone, I recommend reading them in order as they are interconnected
author: Kyra Fox
